title: Provides for drug and alcohol testing of school bus drivers and when circumstances, such as accidents, dictate a more thorough investigation and review
summary: Provides for drug and alcohol testing of school bus drivers during the required biennial medical examination and when circumstances, including but not limited to accidents, dictate a more thorough investigation and review pursuant to regulations issued by the commissioner of motor vehicles.

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in  relation  to  drug  and
         alcohol testing of school bus drivers

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of section 509-g of the vehicle  and  traffic
    2  law,  as  amended by chapter 600 of the laws of 2002, is amended to read
    3  as follows:
    4    1. A biennial examination pursuant to regulations established  by  the
    5  commissioner,  by  a  physician  or  a  nurse practitioner to the extent
    6  authorized by law and consistent with  the  written  practice  agreement
    7  pursuant  to  subdivision three of section six thousand nine hundred two
    8  of the education law who is not the personal physician or nurse  practi-
    9  tioner  of  the  driver.  Included  shall  be a requirement to conduct a
   10  vision test AND A TEST  FOR  THE  PRESENCE  OF  DRUGS  AND/OR  ALCOHOLIC
   11  CONTENT  IN THE DRIVER'S BLOOD AND WHEN CIRCUMSTANCES, INCLUDING BUT NOT
   12  LIMITED TO ACCIDENTS, DICTATE A MORE THOROUGH INVESTIGATION  AND  REVIEW
   13  pursuant to regulations issued by the commissioner.
   14    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect on the sixtieth day after it shall
   15  have become a law.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
